Malice/ Injustice/ Necross/ Splattercannon:

Splattercannon transformed into his gunship form and flew out of the 
air lock.  Malice and Injustice latched on as they had no way of 
moving in space and were getting really cold.  Necross followed, wary 
of the two smaller bots.
"Okay Blacknightmare, can we go now?  Malice and I are about to 
freeze our tails off!" Injustice said, pleading through the comms to 
get somewhere warm.
"Ditto that, let's get moving!  I think my tail just might fall off!" 
he added, trying to get sympathy from Blacknightmare.
